views.markdown:
Dissident is stable again, but needs some more work for unlimited native mode - Fixed that annoying popup bug - Initial iOS 10 Support - Initial support for iOS 9.2 - 9.3.3 - Fixed app layout on iPad
- Minor bug fixes

- App Store now kills Apps when updated
- Removed the Toggle Foregrounding Permanent activator action
- Changed the way of displaying the icon badge, Dissident now uses the update badge
- Changed the way of forced launch and forced relaunch (Dissident doesn't use temporary foregrounding to update the UI anymore)
- Fixed statusbar not showing until app is opened
- Fixed icon badge not displaying the correct background mode (happened when toggling foregrounding with activator)
- Fixed statusbar not displaying the correct background mode (happened when toggling foregrounding with activator)

- Support for iOS 9 - Brought back statusbar indication

- Bug fixes, improvements and a ton of changed stuff under the hood
ADDED:
- Fast Freeze background mode
- Unlimited Native background mode
- Prevent termination option

FIXED / IMPROVED
- Fixed Dissident settings icon not appearing on homescreen
- Fixed auto launch / auto relaunch for native mode
- Improved overall UI
- Improved icon badge settings
- Improved activator support (added a temporary foregrounding action and integrated assigning activator actions into settings app)
- Many other things
